result.name: lincs-belt-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
Two surveys of Lincs Belt rMCZ site have been completed to date (Apr 2015): 
Cruise: LNCB_22_2012 Date: Unknown Data collected: MB Bathymetry Coverage 
(Contractor): Partial coverage (ITT_lncb_22_2012). CHP data planned for early 
2015 MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): Partial coverage 
(ITT_lncb_22_2012). CHP data planned for early 2015 SS Coverage: None acquired 
to date Video and Stills Samples to date: None acquired to date PSA Samples to 
date: None acquired to date Infauna Samples to date: None acquired to date 
Cruise: lncb_hgdn0212 Date: Feb - Mar 2012 Data collected: MB Bathymetry 
Coverage (Contractor): None acquired to date MB Backscatter Coverage 
(Contractor): None acquired to date SS Coverage: None acquired to date Video 
and Stills Samples to date: 8 - Unusable PSA Samples to date: 45 Infauna 
Samples to date: 45 - 15 samples using WFD method only
